document_data.mainbody:
Corwell was a kingdom on the isle of Gwynneth within the Moonshae Isles.
Corwell was located in southern Gwynneth. Its northern borders were marked by the Highlands and Cambro Mountains, both of which formed a rocky boundary between the northern half of the island. Much of Corwell was covered by the Llyrath Forest. The eastern arm of Corwell included the land between the Cambro Mountains and the Strait of Alaron up to the settlement of Thorndyke.
Corwell was the first and oldest kingdom of the Ffolk within the Moonshaes Isles. It was founded by a Ffolk hero named Cymrych Hugh, who later became the first High King and moved his capital to Callidyrr.
